title: Speed of object under net force

content.prompt: A 5 kg object is propelled from rest at time t = 0 by a net force F that always acts in the same direction. The magnitude of F in newtons is given as a function of t in seconds by F = 0.5t. What is the speed of the object at t = 4 s?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
